title: report object
description: Report header detailing the Account, Order and Orderline information for the Stats arrays

$schema.description: $schema only included to aid validation of JSON, should not be used in real calls.

AccountId.title: Account ID
AccountId.description: The ID of the account that identifies the buyer, advertiser and any other stakeholders.

OrderId.title: Order ID
OrderId.description: The ID of the order that the Stats belong to

LineId.title: Line ID
LineId.description: The ID of the Order Line that the Stats belong to

OOHProviderData.description: The OOHProviderData object is used for Buyers to detail structured information that may be used to identify their order in a Seller's system using their own IDs or references.

Stats.description: An Array of playout events that can be aggregated from a single playout event to a summary of perfromance over the whole campaign period.
